title: Looking for a Top Laner for a ranked team
body:
Hey there

Looking for a top laner to join my current team of 4 cool dudes ready to kick some ass in ranked.

2 of us are prelim e.g. haven't earned rank this season and the other 2 in the team are silver 4 and 5.

I don't care if you're bronze, silver, gold or above all that matters is that you have a good attitude and the ability to communicate well.

Also the ability to not take things too seriously, learn from your mistakes and know that getting better takes time and practice.

If you want to try out we're doing some games this Friday, add me: FischSandwich and mention this post.

Looking forward to hearing from you

Cheers

FischSandwich {{champion:112}}

replies.body: diamond player looking for a nice team, add koopa yoshi
Sweet as, saw it come through last night. If you're keen we're doing some ranked Friday afternoon from 5pm.
If you guys are interest I'd be glad to spectate your ranked team and provide feedback so that you guys can get stronger.
